activities: Opal Labs Inc. ("Opal") serves enterprise customers with the Opal Platform, a suite of premium, cloud-based, collaborative planning tools, applications, and features for brand marketing teams.  Opal provides marketing teams with intuitive and beautiful applications that facilitate centralization, consistency, approval, and delivery of marketing content. To promote collaboration around marketing content, Opal Platform users are prompted to enter information related to the individual’s department, name, job title, profile photograph, work location, work e-mail address, work phone number, personal social media account, or similar kinds of information. New users are prompted to enter this information via the SSL secured web portal made available to enterprise customers by the customer's account administrator. Additionally, certain personal information is collected automatically, both from the Opal Platform and the external company website (workwithopal.com) using data collection technologies such as cookies, web beacons, gifs, or other tracking technologies. This information is used to monitor, support, and improve the website and Opal Platform and to develop new products, services, or features.
